name: DBZ Saiyan Son Goku
text:
When this card is Normal or Special Summoned (except by its own effect): You can add 1 "Kamehameha" Spell/Trap Card from Deck to your hand. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and resolve this effect.
Once per turn, you can move this card to an unused adjecent Main Monster Zone.
You can only activate 1 of the following effects of "DBZ Saiyan Son Goku" once per turn:
? Once while face up on the field, when this card is targeted for an attack or opponent's card effect (Quick Effect): You can move this card to an unused adjecent Main Monster Zone, and if you do, negate the attack or card effect. 
? Once per turn, when a monster you control is targeted for an attack or opponent's card effect (Quick Effect): Return that target to your hand, and Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card becomes the new target for the attack or card effect instead.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
